story_bank.title: VIP.com Return Classification Success
story_bank.content: Successfully led the integration of DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier at VIP.com, achieving human-level accuracy (98%) in predicting return responsibilities using multimodal embeddings and FAISS.

story_bank.content: Engineered a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker, significantly improving forecasting accuracy (5.2% MAPE) and database integration for informed demand planning decisions.

story_bank.title: Automated Data Pipeline
story_bank.content: At Amazon, developed an automated AWS EC2 data pipeline, reducing daily reporting query time by 70% and enhancing decision-making efficiency for over 100 stakeholders.

generated_content.content:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Machine Learning Engineer, AGIF position at Amazon.com Services LLC. As a soon-to-be graduate from UC Berkeley with a Master's degree in Industrial Engineering & Operational Research, I bring a strong foundation in software development, machine learning techniques, and a track record of successful project delivery.

One of my key achievements was successfully leading the integration of the DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier during my internship at VIP.com. This complex project involved utilizing Python, PyTorch, and HuggingFace, along with multimodal embeddings and FAISS. The result was a prediction model with human-level accuracy of 98% for return responsibilities. I believe this experience, coupled with my expertise in software development, aligns well with your requirement for a professional with solid software development and design architecture experience.

Another project I'm particularly proud of was the creation of a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker. This model improved forecasting accuracy to a 5.2% MAPE, providing VIP.com with a robust tool for informed demand planning decisions. This project not only honed my skills in working with AWS services but also underlined the value I can bring to Amazon in terms of building, testing, and maintaining key tooling for model evaluation.

As a passionate engineer and scientist, I am excited about the opportunity to work with a team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of innovation. I am particularly drawn to Amazon's commitment to representing the customer perspective through accurate benchmarking and believe that my experiences and passion for machine learning make me a strong candidate for this role.

In closing, I am excited about the prospect of bringing my unique blend of skills and experiences to Amazon.com Services LLC. I am confident that my background in software development, machine learning, and project management will be of great value to your team. I look forward to the possibility of discussing this exciting opportunity further.

Thank you for considering my application.

Best Regards,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu

Dear Hiring Manager,

I'm writing to express my interest in the Unknown Job Title position at Meta. As a soon-to-be graduate of the Master of Engineering in Industrial Engineering & Operational Research program at UC Berkeley, I've honed my analytical skills and developed a deep understanding of data-driven decision making. My experience as a Data Science Intern at VIP.com further showcases my ability to leverage large datasets to solve complex problems and drive product strategy.

At VIP.com, I led the integration of DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier, where I used multimodal embeddings and FAISS to achieve an impressive 98% human-level accuracy in predicting return responsibilities. This successful project demonstrates my proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, which aligns with the technical expertise your role requires.

I also engineered a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker during my tenure at VIP.com. This project significantly improved forecasting accuracy to a 5.2% MAPE, demonstrating my ability to understand ecosystems, user behaviors, and long-term product trends. With my proficiency in SQL and my strong understanding of statistical/mathematical software like R, I am confident in my ability to handle Meta's large and complex datasets.

My interest in Meta extends beyond the role's requirements. I am drawn to Meta's vision of moving beyond 2D screens towards immersive experiences like augmented and virtual reality. I am excited at the prospect of using my skills to contribute to this next evolution in social technology.

In closing, I believe the Unknown Job Title position at Meta is a perfect match for my qualifications. I am excited about the opportunity to apply my skills and experiences to contribute to Meta's mission. I look forward to the possibility of discussing my application with you further.

Thank you for considering my application.

Best Regards,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Data Scientist, Product Analytics position at a Scientist. As a Master of Engineering graduate with a specialization in Industrial Engineering & Operational Research, I'm excited about the opportunity to apply my skills in your dynamic environment. 

My experience as a Data Science Intern at VIP.com has equipped me with a deep understanding of data analytics, as well as the technical skills required for this role. I successfully led the integration of the DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier, achieving human-level accuracy (98%) in predicting return responsibilities. This project demanded a keen understanding of data mining and analytical problem-solving. 

Further, my experience in developing a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker at VIP.com, which improved accuracy by 5.2%, demonstrates my capacity for using quantitative approaches to understand long-term product trends. This aligns directly with your need for a professional who can identify and measure the success of product efforts through goal setting and monitoring of key product metrics.

In addition to my work experience, I bring a robust technical toolkit. My proficiency in Python, SQL, TensorFlow, and other scripting languages aligns with your job requirements. Moreover, my ability to use these tools to generate actionable insights and drive data-driven projects from definition to execution is a testament to my readiness for this role.

I am drawn to a Scientist because of your commitment to using data to solve complex problems and inform strategy decisions. I am excited about the prospect of working with your cross-functional teams to leverage data in creating innovative solutions. 

In conclusion, I am confident that my strong technical abilities, coupled with my passion for analytics and proven track record, make me a compelling candidate for this role. I am eager to contribute to your team and look forward to the possibility of discussing my application with you further.

Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Data Scientist, Product Analytics position at a Scientist. As an upcoming Master of Engineering graduate from UC Berkeley with a focus on Industrial Engineering and Operational Research, I am eager to apply my strong analytical skills and passion for data in a challenging and innovative environment.

In my previous role as a Data Science Intern at VIP.com, I led the integration of DeepSeek RAG zero-shot classifier, achieving a 98% accuracy rate in predicting return responsibilities. This was accomplished by using multimodal embeddings and FAISS. This project not only honed my technical expertise in Python, PyTorch, and AWS but also exhibited my ability to apply advanced statistical techniques to solve complex problems. 

Additionally, I engineered a distributed LightGBM forecasting model on AWS SageMaker, improving forecasting accuracy by 5.2%. I believe my experience in developing and executing data-driven projects will greatly contribute to your team's ambitious goals. My robust knowledge of SQL and scripting languages like Python will allow me to effectively analyze and interpret complex data sets, as required for this role.

The opportunity to work with a Scientist excites me as your company's work aligns with my passion for leveraging data to drive product strategy and investment decisions. I am particularly impressed by your dedication to serving billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses. I am confident that my unique blend of skills and experiences will make a significant impact on your team.

In closing, I am keen to bring my technical abilities, analytical mindset, and commitment to achieving results to a Scientist. I am eager to further discuss how my background can be a valuable addition to your team.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of contributing to a Scientist.

Best Regards,
Zikai (Kerry) Liu
